name: Cordis Germina
desc2: Equip to increase Attack Agents' combat capabilities
phaseDescs: Increases CRIT Rate by <ct color=#2BAD00>15%</ct>. When the equipper deals DMG with a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct>, they gain 1 stack of a buff. Each stack increases the equipper's <ct color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</ct> by <ct color=#2BAD00>12.5%</ct>, up to 2 stacks. Each stack lasts 40s. The duration of each stack is calculated separately. Can trigger once per use of a skill. At 2 stacks, the wearer's <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct> and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</ct> DMG ignore <ct color=#2BAD00>20%</ct> of enemy DEF.
